config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'MEDIA' is retrieved from the hints map using the key 'KEY_MEDIA'. If the value is not found in the hints map, it falls back to the superclass method to get the media configuration.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration 'MEDIA' is triggered whenever the getMedia() method is called in the code.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'MEDIA' configuration option on the system is minimal as it is just a string value that is retrieved when needed in the getMedia() method.
